Cat-Eyed Strike.name: Cat-Eyed Strike
Cat-Eyed Strike.flavor: Your sharp senses allow you to aim for a gap in your foe’s defenses.
Cat-Eyed Strike.attack: Strength vs. Reflex (melee) or Dexterity vs. Reflex (ranged)
Cat-Eyed Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Lurk Unseen.name: Lurk Unseen
Lurk Unseen.flavor: You and your cat move like mist in the grass.
Lurk Unseen.requirement: You and your beast companion must have concealment.
Lurk Unseen.targets: You and your beast companion in the burst
Lurk Unseen.effect: Each target has total concealment until the end of your next turn or until the target attacks.

Panther Pounce.name: Panther Pounce
Panther Pounce.flavor: At your signal, your cat launches at your enemy, tearing with tooth and claw.
Panther Pounce.target: One creature designated as your quarry
Panther Pounce.onHit: 2[B] + beast’s Dexterity modifier damage. If your beast companion was hidden from the target at the start of your turn, the attack deals 3[B] extra damage.
Panther Pounce.effect: Before and after the attack, your beast companion can shift its speed, ignoring difficult terrain.
